MyFirstMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
MyFirstMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

MyFirstMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
MyFirstMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
MyFirstMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

MyFirstMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
MyFirstMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

MyFirstMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
MyFirstMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !MyFirstMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

MyFirstMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
MyFirstMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !MyFirstMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
